sourcesContent: import { MdDeleteForever } from 'react-icons/md' import { StyleSheet, SafeAreaView, View, Image, Text } from 'react-native' const Note = ({ id, text, date, today, handleDeleteNote }) => { return ( {text} {date} . {today} Видалити handleDeleteNote(id)} className='delete-icon' size='2.6em' /> ); }; const styles = StyleSheet.create({ note: { backgroundColor: '#fafafa', border: 'solid', color: '#000', borderStartColor: '#9e5cf6', borderEndColor: '#9e5cf6', borderTopColor: '#9e5cf6', borderBottomColor: '#9e5cf6', borderRadius: 25, padding: '1rem', minHeight: 260, display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', justifyContent: 'space-between', whiteSpace: 'pre-wrap', width: '80%', marginLeft: '10%', marginBottom: 2, fontSize: 18, }, noteFooter: { color: '#666', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'space-between', }, centerText: { width: '94%', height: '0.5%', marginLeft: '3%', marginTop: '3%', }, center: { width: '94%', height: '25%', marginLeft: '3%', marginTop: '20%', marginBottom: '1%', }, keyFrame: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', marginRight: '90%', marginLeft: '-7%', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'row', }, keyElement: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', borderRadius: 50, paddingRight: 20, fontSize: 18, fontWeight: 600, }, keyDot: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#9e5cf6', borderRadius: 50, fontSize: 18, marginLeft: -40 }, key: { backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6', color: '#fff', marginRight: '50%', marginLeft: '42%', }, }); export default Note
